mapper.select: select a.menu_seqno, a.s_se, b.s_name, a.menu_name, a.menu_price, a.menu_ex, a.menu_img, a.menu_cal from menu a, store b where b.s_seqno=#{param1} and a.s_se = b.s_seqno
select * from store where s_name like '%'||#{param1}||'%'
select b.s_name, a.m_id, a. r_content, a.r_date, a.score from review a, store b where b.s_seqno=#{param1} and a.s_seqno = b.s_seqno
select * from menu where menu_seqno=#{param1} and s_se=#{param2}
